activities: GXS receives and uses personal information in the course of GXS’ business activities which includes, without limitation: (1) personal information of current, former or prospective employees and contractors of GXS in connection with the administration of personnel relationships, providing services and benefits in connection with personnel relationships, maintaining contact with former personnel, and reviewing information concerning job applicants; (2) personal information of employees and other personnel of GXS customers and prospective customers in connection with the promotion and sale of GXS services and products and the provision and support of GXS services and products to current and prospective customers including but not limited to provide services, respond to inquiries, send requested information, provide training and customer support services, (3) personal information of employees of third parties (such as vendors and contractors) or third party individuals in connection with managing and administering business activities with such third parties; and (4) personal information of customers of GXS customers and prospective customers processed using GXS services in connection with the promotion and provision of services and support of such GXS customers and prospective customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, online, manually processed and human resources data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
